五六百小时的老玩家了，从杀机出来我就一直在看视频，当时因为网吧没有这个游戏也没有条件所以一直没有玩到，后来，大学了有时间也有条件去玩了，这种追逐类游戏的始祖就是杀机了，毫无疑问的经典之作，DLC作的一直很好，总之就是很喜欢这款游戏了，想玩的时候甚至会去网吧，拿U盘下载来玩几局，哈哈哈，爱了啊。

i used to like this game, but now it's too much. First of all the red addons for each category are so damn unbalanced, so if you find survivors or killers using red offerings or addons the game is over, also it's getting impossible to play the game as killer, survivors keeps quitting and you have to wait for like hours. So i decided to don't play this game for a while, i'm gonna move to other games wating to these issues to get fixed.

Have poured many hours into this game at the time of writing this review and haven't regretted it. Dead by Daylight is always there for me when I need a game to play by myself, or enjoy a good time with my friends. The game can be suspenseful at some times, but it just makes it even more fun in my opinion. Gameplay is fun and the community can be great, depending on who you talk to. Don't hesitate to pick it up, you won't regret it.

First off I've refunded this game as since it doesn't run well on my laptop. The game is fun. It's addicting and at some moments it gets your heart racing. But sweet jesus the community sucks! I know every review says this but it's insane. You have to be half way across the map to not be called a camper. If you can't get any survivor cause they're in a SWF and lose you get called trash and rubbish. And if you touch a SWF group get your inbox ready. I've since moved to PS4 where the community is better ( not by much ) The bugs aren't as bad also. The playerbase is also quite large. I don't recommend this game on PC. The playerbase and unsupporting devs ruin it. I'd recommend PS4 if you'd like to move over. I've met new friends also. XBOX is dying slowly off anyway. I'm ready for people to say get over it or you're a pu!!sy. Get the game on console is all I'm saying. Good day

黎明杀机游戏忠告（人类很少有人玩）， 人类活的有点悲惨，基本电机开不了几个，剩一个人基本可以说没有（逃生的几率）,人类带（4个技能基本必带自摸）所以人类可以简称带了（3个技能 ）（屠夫）本身（自带技能）加上（自带专属技能再加4个附属技能属于5个技能），我觉得每个人类都应该有自己的优点，而不是（都带一样的技能感觉没什么特别之处），我建议人类进行修改，比如.（自带治疗技能，克劳戴特自摸会提高，彭怀特带领队范围会提升，梅格托马斯弹射效果加强)，每个人都带特别加成这样玩着会比较有意思！                                                   Dawn Kill Game Advice(few humans play), humans live a bit miserable, basic motors can not open a few, leaving one can basically say no(chance of escape), The human belt(4 skills must basically be self-touching), so humans can simply bring(3 skills)(Butcher) itself(with skills) plus(with exclusive skills and 4 ancillary skills belong to 5 skills). I think that every human should have its own advantages, not(all with the same skills feel nothing special), I suggest that humans make changes, such as. (With self-treatment skills, Kelaodaite will improve, Penghuaite will increase the range of team leaders, and Meigetuomasi will enhance the ejection effect.) It will be more interesting for everyone to play with special bonuses!

Достаточно долго играю в эту игру и последнее время понимаю что с каждым разом играть в нее все скучнее...маны то кемпят и тунелят, то занимаются полной фигней..выжившие просто страдают ху...ней. Разработчики занимаются только магазином и добавляют новых манов и сурвов..больше ничего..сурвы жестко сосут у мана..и разрабам пофиг..они все равно делают мана сильнее чтоб сурв ваще знатно а..уевал...единственное что можно хорошо посмеяться с друзьями в совместном матче))

Honestly i am a competitive gamer i played many hours on ps4 and had alot of fun doing so, after that i came here on steam because everyone who plays on ps4 are not as skilled as people on PC as the game has been out longer.
now from time to time you will run into a random bug that is really bad lol. like somehow getting stuck inside stack of tires or inside of a pallet that you dropped or sometimes they even had pallets that are not dropped standing upward so you cant pass them.
now forget all that the game was really really fun when you are new to the game and have no clue how to play as you are learning the game.
but after that point with getting deranked losing all bloodpoints telling us we should back up the saves or running into bad host with high ping because its 100% dependent on the killers host it just feels like the DEVs really dont care about the game or they are very very slow to do anything about it and dont listen to the community.

also this game has this thing where both sides dont know how to play together the game is not just about winning its about making the game enjoyable for others what the DEVs forgot to mention so you will get survivors doing really cheesy tactics to the killer or have the killer facecamp you LOL... and this game has no rules and the DEVs dont enforce ANYTHING like the fact i have *popular* streamers always drunk and yelling like a child that will pull his plug when he gets pissed at the killer after trying to make the killer chace him the whole time. and most streamers think the DEVs are a joke and wont enforce bans on anyone even though they say they will?.
so this is when you get *highskilled* players pulling plugs tell they derank to 20 "the starting rank" so they can ruin the game for others but they do this for afew reasons 1. they are bad and cant keep up LOL when its not hard. 2. matchmaking takes way too long at higher ranks.

Talking about ranks the ranking system is Really Really Really BAD! i went from buying this game on launch to never playing it for no reason to playing it alot all my hours came quick and the climb was really sad when i say that it takes afew days to get rank1 and everyone who is rank1 are not as skilled as you would hope... 

tbh the ranking system was my biggest problem with this game it was not skilled at all.
the new maps are not that great imo i love the old maps classic.

on a last note i really dont want to downvote but i feel like not much has really been done to keep this game alive and interesting or DEVs not enforcing rules maybe they are scared to take action on streamers because it helps keep this game alive idk?

这是我steam上第一款游戏，从初中开始玩，一直玩到现在大学了。虽然现在它不是我最喜欢的游戏，但是我也还是非常愿意玩它的。游戏性方面，无论是非对称的机制还是随机生成的地图都给每局游戏带来了很大的可玩性，修机和与屠夫斗智斗勇也挺有意思的。不过让我失去游戏热情的一个很大的原因就是玩法毒瘤的玩家太多。屠夫一方有兔妈红配举斧守尸，巴布静止隐身守尸或者开局针对追你一个到死，或者是人一方的手电速修人皇车队，都互相破坏着对方的游戏体验。我对这种现状无能为力，只能希望这样的玩家能少一点。

Игра очень затягивает и завлекает своей атмосферой и ощущением страха при игре за выжившего.Со временем этот самый страх отступает,однако он всегда имеет место быть.При игре за маньяка по настоящему ощущается чувство,что жизни этиъ людей в твоих руках.Особой кровожадности не испытывается при этом,просто хочется иногда после тяжелого дня позлорадствовать в игре.Сама по себе игра отличная.Однако надоедает эта постоянность,нужно что - то новое.Не говорю,что радикально новое,но всё же.Очень хорошо,что можно играть с друзьями,за это просто огромный плюс.Настроение от игры с друзьями всегда положительное.За исключением моментов,когда против нас играет не очень хороший маньяк,в плане кемпинга.Однако,слава богу,я встречаюсь с этим редко.Всем советую поиграть в эту игру.

Keine Chance, dass das Scheißteil ne Empfehlung kriegt.

Balancing = 0. Wer nach einem fairen Spielerlebnis sucht ist in diesem Spiel falsch! Möchtest du hingegen nur so hart wie mögliche andere in deiner Umgebung abfucken und trollen bist du hier genau richtig und kannst dich zum üblichen Dreck der hier spielt gesellen.

Selbst einfachste Dinge müssen gekauft werden, es kann NICHTS erspielt werden was zu "custom design" gehört.

Außerdem wird man so oder so jede Runde beleidigt nach dem Spiel und die Developer kümmern sich einen Dreck um Ihre Community und die Reports.

Wer es kauft ist selber Schuld, dass er sich am Ende über sich selber Ärgert.


Update 16.06.2018:
Das Spiel ist jetzt vollständig unspielbar geworden.
1. Wenn man Überlebenden spielt fliegt man zufällig, plötzlich aus Sitzungen raus und verliert alles - Opfergaben, Items und Punkte der Runde.
2. Wenn man Killer spielt kommt es sehr häufig vor, dass nur 1 der 4 Überlebenden überhaupt im Spiel ankommt.
3. Obwohl neu installiert und EAC neu installiert lässt sich das Spiel nicht mehr öffnen und gibt nur den Hinweis, dass EAC nicht ausgeführt werden kann.

-> Für mich ist dieses Spiel komplett gestorben.

ПРОТЕВОРЕЧИВАЯ ИГРА(В ПЛАНЕ ХОРОШАЯ ОНА ИЛИ ПЛОХАЯ),ЕСЛИ ПОПАДЁТСЯ КЕМПЕР ИГРА ПРЕВРАЩАЕТСЯ В КАКУЮ ТО ЕБ@Т*Ю,ЭТА ПАРОДИЯ НА УБИЙЦУ ПРОСТО ДО САМОГО ТВОЕГО КОНЦА БУДЕТ СТОЯТЬ И ЖДАТЬ,А В ЭТО ВРЕМЯ ДРУГИЕ ИГРОКИ СЬ$,УТЬСЯ,ЖОПА ТАК И БУДЕТ ГОРЕТЬ,НО ИНОГДА(ПРАВДО НЕ ЧАСТО)ПОПАДАЮТСЯ НОРМАЛЬНЫЕ УБИЙЦЫ,КОТОРЫЕ НЕ ПРОСТО НЕ БУДУТ КЕМПЕРИТЬ,ОНИ ЕЩЁ И ПОЛОЖАТ ВСЕХ,ВОТ В ЭТОТ РАЗ ПУ?АН ТОЧНО ВЗОРВЁТСЯ.
Но при всём этом игра лично для меня остаётся интересной и затягивающей.
В кемперах есть и плюс:Если они поймают кого то левого,и будут стоять рядом с ним пока он не откинет капыта,вы уже почините все или по краиней мере половину генераторов,и возможно сбежите.
А если ты ещё и опытный игрок и умеешь мансить,то можно вдовль насладиться попытками убийцы попасть по тебе,и тогда не у тебя а у убийцы подгорит.

TEN BUCKS OMG grab this game! You can play forever and not even have played a killer or even the other way around. Dont get involved with the salty 9 year olds, you win some you loose some and both killers and survivors are OP. At first I hated this game cause it was challenging. After a month I loved to see how far I got "oh $hit, now I can do generators.." For a casual time killer piece that you can jump into on your PUBG breaks or Fortnite breaks. This is my solitare for my PC
KIRLÁJ

Meiner Meinung nach in das Spiel immer wieder schön zu spielen :D 
Man muss sich zwar erst etwas in das Spiel einarbeiten, um Perks und Killer zu verstehen, aber dann macht es sehr Spaß.
Camper und Focuser sind zwar häufig ein Problem, aber man spielt letztendlich nur um die Blutpunkte, man muss nicht jedes mal entkommen und manchmal schafft man es auch einem solchen Killer zu entkommen.
Außerdem denkt sich das Team auch immer wieder neue Events und Aufgaben für die Community aus, damit das Spiel über das jahr nicht langweilig wird :D

Also: Kauft das Spiel erst wenn ihr es schon etwas kennt, da der Einstieg sonst ziemlich deprimierend enden kann und fangt einfach nicht an nach der Runde Killer oder Teammates zu beleidigen - es bringt eh nichts :D

Spread Love and be kind  :P

Ok... so I can not say this enough!! TRY THIS GAME OUT!!!

I played 1 to 2 rounds when I fisrt bought this game and thought, "What a waste of money..." The controls were difficult, there were no weapons, and well of course I kept getting captured. I gave it about a month and I decided that I would get it for my husband and we could learn and play together. I mean seriously... The game LOOKS awesome just in watching the videos!! 

I am soooooo glad that I came back to it. The game is truly fun and once you get past learning the controls its actually an amazing time. Sure... I wish that the rounds would last longer, but I love everything about the game. The Graphics are amazing. The adreniline that you get when you hear your heartbeat speed up... The Chase... Let me just say this.. I went from a Level 1... to a Level 7 in ONE night... can we say ADDICTED?!!?

Give it a chance and you too, will love it!
Dieses Spiel macht sehr spaß und mann kann es gut mit freunden Spielen. Ich kann es nur Empfehlen
